query: We are a group of 6 people, looking to plan a week-long vacation spanning from March 21st to March 27th, 2022. Our journey will start from Billings, heading towards Arizona with the intent to visit 3 cities in Arizona. Our total budget for the travel plan is $11,700. The accommodations should allow visitors.
